name: UCommonSessionSubsystem
doc:
Game subsystem that handles requests for hosting and joining online games.
One subsystem is created for each game instance and can be accessed from blueprints or C++ code.
If a game-specific subclass exists, this base subsystem will not be created.

K2_OnUserRequestedSessionEvent: Event broadcast when a local user has accepted an invite
K2_OnJoinSessionCompleteEvent: Event broadcast when a JoinSession call has completed
K2_OnCreateSessionCompleteEvent: Event broadcast when a CreateSession call has completed
K2_OnSessionInformationChangedEvent: Event broadcast when the presentable session information has changed

methods.name: CleanUpSessions
methods.doc: Clean up any active sessions, called from cases like returning to the main menu

methods.name: CreateOnlineHostSessionRequest
methods.doc: Creates a host session request with default options for online games, this can be modified after creation

methods.name: CreateOnlineSearchSessionRequest
methods.doc: Creates a session search object with default options to look for default online games, this can be modified after creation

methods.name: FindSessions
methods.doc: Queries online system for the list of joinable sessions matching the search request

methods.name: HostSession
methods.doc: Creates a new online game using the session request information, if successful this will start a hard map transfer

methods.name: JoinSession
methods.doc: Starts process to join an existing session, if successful this will connect to the specified server

methods.name: QuickPlaySession
methods.doc: Starts a process to look for existing sessions or create a new one if no viable sessions are found
